wdi2-SI.SPR.PCAP.ZG.def: The growth rate in the welfare aggregate of total population is computed as annualized average growth rate in per capita real consumption or income of total population from household surveys over a roughly 5-year period.
wdi2-SI.SPR.PCAP.ZG.name: Annualized average growth rate in per capita real survey mean consumption or income
wdi2-SI.SPR.PCAP.ZG.source: World Bank, Global Database of Shared Prosperity (GDSP) (http://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/poverty/brief/global-database-of-shared-prosperity).
